name: Shell-Bot
description: Telegram bot for executing shell commands

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get your bot token by talking to @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram User ID (go to @MissRose_bot and type /id to get your id)

RCLONE_CONFIG_BASE64.description: Encode your Rclone config using (https://www.base64encode.org/) and paste the result from that website in this place

CREDENTIALS_LINK.description: Put Permanent download link(from Google Drive Index) of your credentials.json File

ACCOUNTS_FOLDER_LINK.description: Put Permanent download link(from Google Drive Index) of your accounts.zip File

LANG.description: Setting the encoding to UTF-8 . Dont edit this value
